feed.title: Anna Prieto Colomina
feed.subtitle: Hi! Iâ€™m a neuroscientist focused on pediatric brain tumors (ETMR), multi-omics, and translational models. PhD candidate, Instituto de Neurociencias (CSIC-UMH). Interest in LIN28/let-7 axis, Dicer, scRNA-seq and in vivo models.
